Class Attack

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Attack

  • public class Attack
extends java.lang.Object

    Attack

    The Attack class implements attack phase operation.
    Since:
    2019-03-08
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    jiamin_he

        defendCountry - The defend country's name.
        mode - The attack mode which player chooses.
        attDices - The number of dices attacker chooses.
        defDices - The number of dices defender chooses.

      • transferArmy

        public void transferArmy(int armies)
        This method implements that after defended country was captured, transfers armies from attack country to defended country after defended country.
        Parameters:
        armies - The number of armies to be transferred.

      • updating

        public void updating(int[] range)
        This method implements that after defended country was captured updating all data. If rang is [0,X], then the armies transfers automatically from attack country to defended country.
        Parameters:
        range - The interval number of armies that attack country can transfer.
